en.apresentacao: Bulding modern applications in the front and back-end
en.aboutTextOne: Hello! I am a Computer Engineering student and I am passionate about developing solutions. As a Full-Stack developer, I have experience in Node.js, .NET Core, TailwindCSS, Nest.js and SQL and NoSQL databases, but my goal is to become a complete Full-Stack developer using React and Serverless.
en.aboutTextTwo: My experience spans multiple technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node, React, C#, and Nest.js. I use these tools to create robust, intuitive, and responsive solutions, always seeking the best user experience.

pt.apresentacao: Construindo aplicações modernas no front e back-end
pt.aboutTextOne: Olá! Sou estudante de Engenharia da Computação e sou apaixonado por desenvolver soluções. Como desenvolvedor Full-Stack, tenho experiência em Node.js, .NET Core, TailwindCSS, Nest.js e bancos de dados SQL e NoSQL, mas meu objetivo é me tornar um desenvolvedor Full-Stack completo usando React e Serverless.
pt.aboutTextTwo: My experience spans multiple technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node, React, C#, and Nest.js. I use these tools to create robust, intuitive, and responsive solutions, always seeking the best user experience.
